name: Not Ice Climbers, Eh?
description:
Not Ice Climbers, eh? or NICE is game that is not about Ice Climbers but a familiar-looking person who is stuck on an empty and lonely iceberg. Discovering magical snowball, he tries to appeal his curiousity(and newly found curse) by trying to collect it!

Game uses WASD for usual movement(left, right and jump!) as well as S and Space for placing or breaking ice. Enter on title or game over screen to (re)start as well as pause. Press Q for screenshot download!
NEW! Includes controller support!(A/X for jump, B/Y for ice placement, Start for start/pause and D-Pad or Joystick for movement(WASD-like))

Inspired by PICO-8 fantasy console and it's U-Turn game. Cover image by Petar K.
